resources.string:
Wager a number of points, up to the maximum points possible for each round.

Guess today's high temperature in Fahrenheit degrees at the given locations.

Points will be awarded based on the maximum points possible for the round, depending on how close you get to the actual high temperature for today and the speed with which you answer.

The number of points you can win per round will increase with the difficulty of the questions.

If you guess today's exact high temperature at the location, you will be awarded 2x the maximum points for the round.

There are %1$d rounds.

Good Luck!
What is the current temperature in Fahrenheit degrees in %1$s?
Forecast Frenzy requires an Internet connection to function properly.
The current temperature in %1$s in Fahrenheit degrees is
You bet %1$d points on this round
Your score for this round is
